definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉碱是一种营养，帮助人体脂肪转化为能量。

sentences.english: Fiber will also help regulate the appearance of cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 纤维也会帮助控制脂肪团的形成。

sentences.english: Ketone bodies are short-chain derivatives of fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 酮体是脂肪酸的短链衍生物。

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 关于瘦身，人们最常问到的问题就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: Instead, he fell victim to his faith in the anti-fat propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 很可惜，他成了“反对脂肪”宣传的牺牲品。

sentences.english: Often, they are cold-pressed and extracted from fatty portions of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 常常，他们冷压萃取脂肪和部分蔬菜。

sentences.english: The proof is in the reduced-fat pudding.
sentences.chinese: 证据就是脂肪含量下降的布丁。

sentences.english: We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天摄入的脂肪量最好不要超过65克。

sentences.english: It discusses the different recognitions to fat liver between TCM and WM .
sentences.chinese: 探讨了现代医学和传统中医对脂肪肝的认识异同。

sentences.english: It is used to thicken sauces and stews in place of flour and fat.
sentences.chinese: 它常用来勾芡酱汁，及在炖菜中取代面粉和脂肪。

sentences.english: Angiomyolipoma was also found in the contralateral kidney.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌脂肪瘤也发现对侧肾。

sentences.english: Extraction of oil from the wheat germ leaves behind the defatted wheat germ.
sentences.chinese: 脱脂肪麦胚是小麦胚提油后的产品。

sentences.english: Donkey milk also has anti-allergen properties and is just 1% fat.
sentences.chinese: 驴奶还含有抗过敏物质，而且脂肪含量仅占1%。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊储存和释放胆汁，协助脂肪分解为微小的颗粒。

sentences.english: Popular cold-weather beverages also can be packed with calories, fat and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 冬季里流行的饮品也富含卡路里，脂肪和糖分。

sentences.english: Endarterectomy removes fatty plaque through an incision in the neck.
sentences.chinese: 通过在颈部切口去除内膜上的脂肪斑块。
